description:
Toriko`s battle with the new type of GT Robot ends unexpectedly, but then it`s Komatsu`s turn to step up to a challenge as he follows Granny Setsu`s recipe for All-Noodles!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honryou Hakki! Komatsu no Shokugi - Jisshoku! Maboroshi no Men "Zenmen"
Showing His True Ability! A Taste of Komatsu`s Honoring the Food!
本領発揮! 小松の食義 実食! 幻の麺"全麺"
